title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing an authorized person in a dream according to the major imams of interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an authorized person in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about seeing an authorized person in a dream It differs greatly depending on the social status of each dreamer, as mentioned by major commentators such as Ibn Sirin in the Book of Dreams, and sometimes it indicates good and sometimes evil.Interpretation of a dream about seeing an authorized person for a young man according to Ibn Shahini. The site explains differentInterpretation of a dream Seeing an authorized person in a dream. What does the following indicate: When you see an unmarried young man with power in a dream, this indicates the kindness and marriage of this young man. If the authorized person sees in a dream a young man writing a book for an unmarried or married girl who is characterized by good qualities and beauty, this means that he will receive A wish that he desires. As for seeing a young man in a dream, in which the person authorized to write a book for an unmarried or married girl who is characterized by badness and ugliness, this indicates that she is doing something that she hates and does not want. And whoever sees in his dream that he is writing his book about a girl whom he has never met before, this is a sign On imminent death or severe weakness in his health and poor condition. Interpretation of seeing the authorized man by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the authorized person in a dream for a married man from the book Interpretation of Dreams by Ibn Sirin as follows: Ibn Sirin believes that whoever sees in a dream an authorized person writing his book about a beautiful girl and knows her, then this Evidence of the arrival of goodness in his life. As for whoever sees that he is writing his book about a woman he does not know, this is evidence of his closeness and separation from the world. Whoever dreams that he is writing his book or marrying one of his mahrams, this means that he will reach puberty or perform Hajj soon. And if a married man sees that he is getting married With another, this is evidence of his abundant survival and enjoyment of money and power, God willing. And whoever dreams that he marries more than four wives, this indicates many good things in the life of opinion. Whoever lies on his sick bed and sees that he is marrying a foreign woman, this is a sign of his near death. Read also: Interpretation Seeing a dead mother sleeping in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the commissioner in an unmarried girl’s dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Some sayings about Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the authorized person in a dream. The single girl has the following: When a capable girl sees in a dream writing her book to a young man she does not know, this is an indication of calamity knocking on her doors. And those around her are busy talking about her. Seeing an empowered girl writing her book while dancing or singing, this indicates that something is happening that affects her honor and dignity. When she sees that her book is written on a napkin in a dream, this indicates that kindness and nourishment will knock on the doors of her life. Interpretation Dream of seeing a commissioner in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees that the commissioner in a dream is writing her book to someone she knows, this is a sign that the curtain has been lifted on her hidden secrets. If a married woman sees herself invited to a wedding, this is a sign of wealth and goodness that will enter her life. If a married woman dreams that she is getting married again, this means that the problems between them will go away. However, if she sees that she is writing her book for someone she knows who is not her mahram, this indicates that the difficulties are serious between her and her family and there are many obstacles in the relationship.

title: Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy that a married woman is about to give birth

preview.html: To learn more about the meanings of this dream and its implications, follow the topic below through the Mufsir website. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman about to give birth in a dream for a single girl When an unmarried woman sees in a dream as if she is about to give birth, God will relieve her of her distress, comfort her, and facilitate her affairs. He will fix her life He gives her everything she desires, but she must be patient and ask for reward, and God knows best. Whoever sees in her dream that she is about to give birth and feels pain and pain in the dream. This is evidence that she is going through a difficult period in her life full of obstacles and problems, but it will end soon, God willing. The birth of a virgin in a dream. It is a promising vision, the spaciousness of life, and psychological comfort after a long period of pressure, poverty, and bad circumstances. The vision also shows many blessings in her life, and God knows best. If an unmarried woman sees herself pregnant in a dream and she is sad and feels very sad. She suffers from the pressures of her family, and the many burdens that They put her on her back. She needs someone to stand by her side and help her, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a pregnant woman giving birth in a dream for a married womanWhen a married woman sees in her dream that she is pregnant and about to give birth. She is in the process of resolving her problems and disagreements with her husband and bringing her back together. Peace and stability to her married life. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is about to give birth, and if she is stressed, God will comfort and comfort her. If she falls ill, she will recover and recover soon, God willing. Experiencing labor pains in a dream without giving birth is evidence of suffering and great effort in matters that There is no benefit or return from it. Childbirth also expresses fatigue, stress, anxiety, and perseverance in difficult situations for a longer period of time. The birth of a boy in a dream indicates problems, financial crises, and debts. As for the birth of a girl, it means good things and abundance of livelihood and money. As for the birth of twins, it is good news on the way, and God I know. The interpretation of seeing a pregnancy about to give birth in a dream for a man and its meaning. This vision in a man’s dream indicates that he will obtain many benefits, whether at work or in life in general, and the benefits of work are a promotion or financial bonus, and the benefits of life are a good wife, and the offspring of boys and girls. When a man dreams that he will have children, it is a sign of paying off his debts, ending a problem, and increasing his money. Whoever sees his wife giving birth in a dream, God will ease his worries and sorrows and provide him with everything he desires. If a man sees his wife giving birth in a dream, then she is also suffering from labor pains. It is A sign that she is a strong and patient person who can overcome anything that harms her. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about premature birth for a pregnant woman. The meaning of seeing a pregnant woman giving birth in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing this dream in the first months of pregnancy indicates that the dreamer will give birth on time. She will complete her pregnancy well and be reassured. On the health and safety of her fetus, God willing. The same vision in the last months of pregnancy indicates the birth of a son who is righteous to his mother and family. It was also said that childbirth in a pregnant woman’s dream is a natural matter, b

title: Seeing a white chicken in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing chickens in a dream, in addition to the meaning of eating, cooking, buying and slaughtering chickens. We will also talk about catching chickens and their feathers in a dream, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a white chicken in a dream for a single girl. A white chicken in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes a beautiful, obedient girl. As for a red chicken in a dream, it indicates a girl in puberty. Seeing a local chicken in a dream means effort and hard work. Seeing a rooster in a single woman’s dream It indicates rebellion against her current situation. Carrying a chicken in an unmarried woman’s dream is interpreted as taking responsibility for the woman from the womb. See also: Raw chicken in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a white chicken in a dream for a married woman. A white chicken in a married woman’s dream is interpreted by girls in her guardianship, and God knows best. He interprets Slaughtering a chicken in a dream with insulting words that the dreamer says to her daughter or boyfriend. Plucking chicken wings or a story in a dream represents revealing a woman’s secrets. If you dream that you are eating raw chicken meat, this suggests bad lessons and gossip. The interpretation of buying chicken is that the fortuneteller hires a woman to help her in business. Household. Interpretation of seeing a white chicken in a dream for a man and its meaning. A white chicken in a man’s dream symbolizes widowed women who take care of orphans. Seeing a chicken in the bedroom indicates that the viewer will be exposed to a health problem. Seeing many chickens in the house means prosperity, wealth and power. Interpretation of hearing the sound of chickens in the bedroom The dream means a lot of talking with women in reality. The rooster in a man’s dream symbolizes the priest, and his frequent screaming in the house is useless. Seeing a rooster and a hen mating in a dream means an abundance of offspring, and God knows best. The meaning of seeing a white chicken in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Giving the chicken For a pregnant woman in a dream, it is interpreted as a gathering of women in her house, and God knows best. Seeing chicken wings in a dream for a pregnant woman means protection, kindness, and some nourishment. Dreaming about the sound of a chicken in a dream is interpreted as hearing bad news from a woman. If a pregnant woman talks in a dream with a chicken, She consults women about her life matters. Buying a rooster in a dream for a pregnant woman means giving birth to a boy who will help her in her old age. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a white chicken. Interpretation of seeing a white chicken in a dream for young men and its meaning. A white chicken in a young man’s dream indicates a submissive and helpless woman. Seeing a big chicken in one dream It refers to the mother or ruler of the house. Dreaming about eating cooked chicken meat indicates a lawful livelihood. When a young man dreams that he is slaughtering a chicken, he marries a virgin. Seeing the dining room full of different types of chicken, indicates a connection between relatives. It is said that a rooster in a young man’s dream is interpreted by a person He commands goodness and does not do it. Interpretation of seeing a white chicken in a divorced woman’s dream. A white chicken in a divorced woman’s dream symbolizes responsibility and care for children. If a divorced woman is bitten by a chicken in a dream, she will be harmed by a woman. Buying a rooster in a dream for a divorced woman

title: Seeing a single girl wearing gold in a dream

preview.html: That is, if the dreamer is single, married, pregnant, or male, we will explain to you from our translator the types of dreams for every dreamer and for everyone who likes to interpret his dreams. Interpretation of wearing gold in a dream for a single girl: Wearing gold in a dream for an unmarried girl means good news and new opportunities. You will find Also a happy life in her future husband who will be a good and loving husband. If an unmarried girl sees gold in her dream that she is wearing a golden crown, and if she is engaged, this means that she will get married soon. If she is not engaged, this indicates that her condition is good and that she is known to a respectable person. When she was in a love relationship with someone, she saw that person offering her a golden crown. This indicates the good intentions of this person and that he wants to be allowed and will propose to her as soon as possible. The same applies to someone who saw gold or wore gold in her dream while she was not married. This indicates that she will achieve what she wants, satisfy her desires in her studies or work, and gain money. Seeing an unmarried girl wearing a golden belt while sleeping. This indicates heavy burdens that she carries alone and she feels tired and exhausted. And seeing a single girl in her sleep wearing gold. This is an unpleasant dream. It indicates that the girl is going through problems and a bad psychological state. See also: Interpretation of a married woman’s dream of pieces of gold. Interpretation of seeing wearing gold in a dream for a married woman. If a married girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a gold ring. This indicates the king’s assertion and control. The ring is made of heavy gold and has a lot of wear on it. From the inscriptions. This indicates that the husband accumulated money, because he obtained money if he traveled, or that he obtained his inheritance from a relative. If a married girl dreams of many golden rings in her dream. This indicates that he will take offspring from children. As well as the one who was She is barren and has no children, and she saw a ring in her dream. This is an indication that she was pregnant with a baby and that she was feeling happy at that moment about it. This reflects her psychological state and she sees in the dream that the boy is support and help in her life, God willing. Interpretation of the vision of wearing gold in A man’s dream and its meaning. If a man sees a golden ring in his dream, this indicates humiliation, distress, and bad circumstances. If a man sees gold in his dream, this indicates a debt in his life that he is unable to repay. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about finding gold in the sea, meaning of seeing wearing gold in A pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation: If a pregnant woman sees gold in her dream, this is evidence of goodness in her future that awaits her. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is wearing gold, her husband will wear a golden ring for her. This indicates that he provides them with security and a heart. He saw that she was wearing a golden bracelet This indicates that the dreamer will give birth to a beautiful and beautiful girl and have a relationship. But if the pregnant woman dreams that she is wearing broken gold, if it is a ring or a bracelet, or she loses it or it falls from it. This indicates the evil, sadness and delusion that will find her as a result of the problems that will occur. In her. Or it shows that she is having problems with her partner. If she sees the fetus being given to her

title: The 7 most famous interpretations of seeing mice being killed in a dream is evidence of a problem

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a girl who sees herself in a dream of mice? Evidence of an abundance of food and righteousness Interpretation of a married woman seeing a mouse in a dream? It indicates marital problems with her husband. What is the interpretation of seeing mice killing single women in a dream? For the disputes and problems that concern her and will become clear soon. What does it mean to see a pregnant mouse in her house and she is afraid? Evidence that he will get a lot of good in the future. Interpretation of a single man seeing mice coming out of his house? Elements of poverty fall on the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a rat for individuals Seeing a single or unmarried girl, and seeing the killing of mice in a dream, indicates the presence of a traitor in her life and she prefers to pay attention to him. Seeing an unmarried girl, and seeing the killing of mice in a dream, indicates the closeness of her relationship and marriage, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. Also, seeing mice killing unmarried women, in a dream, means the disputes and problems that worry her and that will end soon. As for seeing the killing of mice in the hand of an unmarried girl, it indicates the size of the problems and disputes that will be raised in it. The girl's vision of herself in a dream is summarized through mice, and it is evidence of the abundance of nutrition and good that come in Her life. Seeing mice for a married woman Seeing a married woman, and seeing her killing mice in a dream, means a lot of talk about people in their absence. As for seeing a married woman killing mice in a dream, this indicates her lack of self-confidence. Seeing a woman wearing mice in her clothes indicates that there are enemies hiding inside her who want to harm her. Also, if a married woman sees mice in a dream, this indicates marital problems with her husband. A woman who sees a mouse biting her in a dream indicates small problems that she will face, but she will get rid of them soon. Seeing a pregnant rat Dreaming of a pregnant woman killing mice means that she will give birth to a long-lived child. A woman seeing white mice indicates her longevity, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. Seeing a pregnant mouse, a mouse in her house, while she is afraid, is a sign that she will enjoy abundance in the future. Interpretation of seeing a mouse for a man An unmarried or unmarried person who sees mice in a dream indicates the entry of a disabled woman into his life. As for the one who sees himself killing mice in a dream, this indicates victory over enemies. If a man sees mice in a dream, this indicates To follow a large diet. A single man seeing mice coming out of his house is evidence of the poverty that the dreamer suffers from. As for the married man who sees a small mouse in a dream, this indicates that he will give birth to a male, but this is not the case. title: Learn about the interpretation of a broken shoe in a dream for a single woman from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a broken shoe in a dream for a single woman? Interpretation of a broken shoe in a dream for a single woman. Does the meaning of the dream differ depending on the color and type of shoes? When does a dream turn into a harbinger? Is tearing a wide shoe in a dream different from a narrow shoe? In this article, you will find the most important things that jurists have said about this symbol. Do you have a confusing dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a broken shoe in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried fiancée sees in a dream that her shoe is broken, then the scene shows her fiancé’s bad morals and the incompatibility between them. And if she sews the broken part of the shoe, this is a sign that she can try to correct and fix her fiancé’s behavior. So that their marriage continues together. And if her mother gave her a shoe that was cut off in her dream, then this groom will offer her marriage to her mother’s family, and he will not be suitable, and it is better not to mix with him. Ibn Sirin explained that if the dreamer dreams that her shoe is cut off in the street, then the dream indicates that she resigned from her job and therefore Her money will decrease significantly, and if she sees that her shoes have been torn and she immediately puts on her new shoes, the dream may show her dismissal from work, and the start of her work...new, more comfortable and convenient than before. Likewise, when the fiancée takes off her shoes or cuts off her sole and buys new shoes. Strongly, this indicates the dissolution of her current engagement, and after a while she will celebrate a new engagement to a religious young man who has high morals and values. Interpretation of a broken shoe in a dream for a single woman, according to Ibn Sirin. When the dreamer wants to travel in reality and dreams that her shoe is broken and cannot be sewn or repaired, this warns her against stopping and stopping the trip. Permanently, and therefore she must be patient and glorify the Lord of the Worlds in goodness. road. Times and evils, perhaps her interrupted journey was full of evil, and God saved her from this evil. If she dreamed that her father’s shoes were worn out because they were completely burned, then the scene portends bad and indicates the death of her mother. There is no doubt that the entire family will suffer psychological damage due to this unfortunate incident. If an unmarried woman repairs her shoes to reuse them and does not really deal or pay much attention to the side. Emotional, but focused on work and money, the meaning of the dream indicates that she is an intelligent girl who does not back down from that. Difficult situations and she tries to correct and change them until she reaches her goal. The most important interpretations of a broken shoe in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a broken white shoe in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried woman, if she is already engaged and preparing for marriage, and she dreams of white shoes, and in the dream she said it was her wedding shoe, but it was torn. In an emotional relationship that is not based on proper foundations because of her relationship with a person who is not qualified morally and religiously, and this relationship will end soon. If the shoes that were cut in the dream were old and she bought new white shoes, then this is a promising dream and shows a positive change that will make her happy and look at life with a look of hope and optimism, and soon you will do. Get rid of all the ugly things that have spread in your neighborhood

title: What you have never heard of is to see a strange man in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a strange man in a dream is one of the dreams that many people wonder about. Seeing a strange man also often indicates success, goodness, and the disappearance of worries and sorrows if the man is handsome. Interpretation of seeing an ugly strange man in a dream indicates a large number of obstacles and difficulties on the dreamer’s path and this indicates a successive failure in life, so we learn together the details of the entire dream interpretation. Seeing a strange man in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a strange man looking at me with admiration: This vision can It shows how much love and bond this person brings when seen. If a stranger looks at the deity with admiration, it can indicate strong feelings of companionship and familiarity, strong social standing, good relationships and morals for both parties. This can also indicate a feeling of security and comfort and the disappearance of stress and illness from the dreamer’s life. What is the interpretation of seeing a handsome man in a single woman’s dream? A handsome man in a dream for a single girl indicates good news and a good life. If he looks at her and smiles at her or gives her a gift, then this It leads to success in her life and excellence in her field of work and she may soon marry someone she really wants. Interpretation of dreams of a strange man looking at me: Dreaming of a strange man in a dream can indicate good or bad, and this depends on the condition of this man. If the face is wrinkled and weak in The body and speaks loudly, this may indicate problems and fears for the pioneer or a disaster that will occur. This saying applies to men and women. A man can see a strange woman in a dream, and the same interpretation applies to him. Seeing a strange man in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing a strange man in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing a handsome man in a dream wearing perfume indicates kindness, great benefits, and good luck. Seeing a strange man speaking in a calm voice It denotes something beneficial to the owners of this house. If you see a man talking loudly, it means that he will hear sad news. And the interpretation of dreams of a strange man looking at me with admiration. For a married woman, seeing a strange and ugly man looking at me in a dream means that illness will appear in his life. Interpretation of a strange man in According to Ibn Sirin’s dream, if he knows a man and the man comes in the dream with the specific name or name or its equivalent, which indicates that he is the same person that you know in your life, so the interpretation of the dream is according to the rest of the vision. If he takes a diamond from you, then he gets what he wants. If he buys you a new shirt that belongs to politicians, he will consider it an order of the state. If they take a rope from you, it is an alliance, because the Arabs call it an alliance. If it is handsome, white, smells good, or wears nice clothes, it often looks good. If it is The opposite indicates hatred or sadness and anxiety. Whoever sees a strange man in the house, whether male or female, and begins to talk to him, if the dialogue is in a calm voice, then this is a good dream and there is something beneficial for him. The strange man looks with admiration at a married woman and is wearing white clothes. It may indicate angels, or it may indicate good news

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a distorted face in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a deformed face in detail in a dream. The face is the prominent part of a person's forehead. The face contains more than one sense that a person depends on in his life, the eye is the sense of sight, the nose is the sense of smell, the ear is the sense of hearing and the mouth is the sense of taste. Our topic today is a simple and easy way for the reader to understand easily. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a disfigured face has many meanings and meanings that we will learn in detail. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin's facial disfigurement: The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing an ugly face in a dream is a sign of impurity. Seeing a person burning in a dream is evidence that this burned person commits sins that anger God. Seeing a beautiful face in a dream is a testament to the dreamer's modesty, piety and strength of religion. Seeing a yellow or yellow face in a dream is an indication of many fears and sorrows that can be found in the dreamer's life. Interpretation of seeing a disfigured face for a single woman: Interpretation of a dream about a disfigured face in an unmarried girl's dream is evidence that people have wronged the dreamer. Seeing a single girl with a disfigured face in a dream is a sign of getting involved in problems and undermining her career and reputation. Dreaming of a wound in the face in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence that she is suffering from major crises in her life. Interpretation of seeing a woman's face disfigured: The ugly and disfigured face in an unmarried girl's dream is evidence of many worries, problems and pain. The wrinkled face in a married woman's dream is a sign of her beauty and beauty, and her dedication For her life partner. The dream of deformity in a married woman's dream indicates that she is suffering from major problems in her life. Interpretation of seeing a deformed face for a pregnant woman: Seeing a deformed pregnant woman's face indicates the problems and concerns that will come to the dreamer. Dreaming of a deformed face in a woman's dream in a dream is evidence that someone wants to harm her in her life and is close. Seeing a pregnant woman deforming her husband's face in a dream is a sign of a lot of good and abundant money that she and her husband will bring. Interpretation of a dream of deforming the face with pimples: Facial pimples in a dream, if they are in the form of smallpox, are a sign of great profits and an abundance of money. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a face deformed with pimples and an explosion in a dream is evidence of patience and victory. Seeing pimples suddenly appear on the face is a sign of the problems that the dreamer may face. Interpretation of a dream of deforming the face with burning: Seeing a face deformed with burning in a dream is a warning to the dreamer to change his bad qualities and avoid bad behavior. The dream that burns half of the face in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is a hypocritical person who attacks and kills people and has another face in which he represents goodness, guidance and kindness. The dream of a person being burned in a dream is evidence that the person The visionary has some characteristics that others around him hate.
